description: A hike through the desert of Joshua Tree National Park, to a Palm tree Oasis, in a canyon.It's a desert with the rocks and depending on the season much dead vegetation.
directions: East on I 10 from Palm Springs to Cottonwood exit. Turn right to parking area just before Cottonwood visitor centre (you may have to go there first to pay  your park fee for the day)
title: Lost Palms Oasis
